BBFN1.M.DE.N.1.L.W1.S1P.FH.T.BN00.Z01.BG: Liabilities of enterprises vis-à-vis non-residents / Total / All countries

General: Up to and including November 2009 external liabilities of households in Germany. External liabilities of banks (MFIs) in Germany are excluded. Statistical breaks have not been eliminated; the changes in stocks are thus not comparable with the transactions recorded under "Capital transactions with non-residents".
